BBEX3.A.KMF.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the US dollar in the Comoros / USD 1 = KMF ...

Methodology: We do not have any data on US dollar exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the exchange rate for the euro in the Comoros (EUR 1 = KMF 491.96775) in conjunction with the respective annual average euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
